book.title: Cadenzas for Carl Stamitz Viola Concerto No.1 in D, op.1
book.subtitle: Constructed from the text as published by Amadeus (BP 750).

book.title: Cadenzas for Hoffmeister Viola Concerto in D
book.subtitle: Constructed from the composer's material as published by Kunzelmann (No. GM 701).

book.title: Cadenzas for Mozart Violin Concertos No.1 in B flat K207 & No.2 in D, K211
book.subtitle: Constructed from Mozart's text as printed in the "Urtext of the New Mozart Edition" published by Bärenreiter (BA4864a).

book.title: Cadenzas for Haydn 'Cello Concerto in C Hob. VIIb:1
book.subtitle: Composed for his daughter Josephine Knight, (currently Principal 'Cello of the English Chamber Orchestra), the Haydn cadenzas are now published and available for purchase.

book.title: Concerto in C major for Viola, Haydn Hob.VIIb:1
book.subtitle: Mark Knight's transcription of Haydn's 'Cello Concerto in C for viola, complete with cadenzas.
